text.*:
Anargha Nimisham (Invaluable Moment) is a collection of short stories by Vaikom Muhammad Basheer published in 1946.[1] Unlike other works by Basheer which are filled with humour and satire, stories of Anargha Nimisham mostly deal with philosophical and spiritual aspects.[2]

List of stories[edit]

  • "Anargha Nimisham"
  • "Jeevitham"
  • "Mangalaashamsakal"
  • "Sandhyapranamam"
  • "Yuddham Avasanikkanamenkil"
  • "Vishudharomam"
  • "Poonilavil"
  • "Anal Haq"
  • "Ekanthathayude Mahatheeram"
  • "Ajnathamaya Bhaviyilekk"

References[edit]

  1. ^ ."Works by Vaikom Muhammad Basheer". New York University. Retrieved 3 June 2013.
  2. ^ Satchidanandan (February 2008). "Sultan of story: A birth centenary tribute to Vaikom Mohammed Basheer who picked up his tales from life's poetry". Frontline. 25 (2). Retrieved 3 June 2013.
